name: bdbrowser
description: An unofficial BetterDiscord injector for the web-client
author: Strencher

scripts.copy-bd: mkdirp "dist/bd/" && echo "Put the betterdiscord.asar or BetterDiscord's renderer.js in this folder to use a local version that overrides the VFS." > "dist/bd/README.txt"
scripts.copy-to-dist: pnpm run copy-assets && pnpm run copy-locales && pnpm run copy-manifest && pnpm run copy-bd && pnpm run copy-licenses
scripts.build: pnpm run build-backend && pnpm run build-frontend && pnpm run build-preload && pnpm run build-service && pnpm run copy-to-dist
scripts.build-prod: pnpm run lint && pnpm --filter backend build-prod && pnpm --filter frontend build-prod && pnpm --filter preload build-prod && pnpm --filter service build-prod && pnpm run copy-to-dist && echo Finished Build
scripts.lint: eslint --ext .js common/ && pnpm --filter backend lint && pnpm --filter frontend lint && pnpm --filter preload lint && pnpm --filter service lint
